entity.name: Yeeth Security
entity.description: Maintainer of DevGuard, an open-source security extension designed to protect Cursor developers from malicious extensions. The goal is to make the Cursor ecosystem safer by providing automated scans, real-time monitoring, and one-click protection against malicious extensions.

projects.name: DevGuard
projects.description: DevGuard is a security-focused Cursor extension that automatically scans, monitors, and protects developers from malicious extensions. It compares installed extensions against a known malicious list, provides real-time auditing, and one-click uninstall for flagged extensions. Its mission is to give developers peace of mind while coding by keeping their environment safe.

channels.description: Support DevGuard securely through online banking.

plans.name: Support DevGuard Development
plans.description: Help sustain infrastructure and active development for continuous security updates to keep developers safe from malicious extensions.

plans.name: One-Time Donation
plans.description: Contribute any amount to support the project and its mission.
